Welcome to Redview County, a gritty open road environment where the
intensity of the street's ultimate rivalry between cops and racers never
stops. Watch the stakes grow through a new scoring system that lets racers
risk their speed points to shoot for higher multipliers and greater rewards,
or bank their speed points safely when they return to a hideout. The more
risk you take on, the faster you can progress, but get busted by the cops
and they take your speed points as a reward. Hundreds of thousands of speed
points can be at stake at every turn and at every bust  will you go from
hero to zero
